site_title: Simple Rose with My New Twist by Wilson Lee

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Here at Heap Art, we are trying to inspire people to connect with each other through origami and paper folding. Today is another special piece. Today we will learn my new version of the Simple Rose. In this version I made some improvements to the simple rose and would like to share it with you. I stumbled across the simple rose and was instantly attracted to it. The simple rose is really beautiful. Once I learned how to fold it, I realized the rose was not symmetrical and I cam up with this solution. I hope you like it. This rose is designed by me, Wilson Lee, and it is base on the Simple Rose (Omuta Rose A) by Fumiaki Shingu. Thanks for watching. Here at Heap Art, we are trying to help you practice origami on a regular bases. Every week I will select a minimum of 2 origami models and show you how to fold it. If you like origami and paper airplanes -- Please use the following link to subscribe to my channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/heapart?sub_confirmation=1 My Upload Schedule: Tuesday : A new Paper Airplane, part of my 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge Friday : A new Origami Model never seen before on my channel Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
